Summary: Object shows up in a photo - not witnessed by eye. Photo taken outside prior to a heavy rain. No airplanes in area/reflections of any kind.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Varadero
There were no other sightings in Varadero on or around August 2nd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy mother and i were vacationing in cuba at the time. a heavy storm was about to arrive and we went out onto the balcony to take some pictures of the ocean\sky. we did not notice this object at the time. only after going through our photos did we notice a bright, orb-like object in one of the pictures. there was zero chance of this being an airplane (airspace is fairly restricted in cuba and only a few flights come into varadero airport each day). there was also no chance of this being a reflection from the sun as there the cloud cover was far too dense.
